name: Cowboy Dash
description:
This game is based on the Chrome t-rex game that you can play when you have no Wi-Fi. In fact thats why I decided to create this game. My Wi-Fi went out and I played it for a bit and then decided I wanted to try and make my own version of it. Also I am aware that the name of this game sucks xD

How to Play

Jump over the incoming obstacles and score a point every time you do. Try to get the highest score that you can. My high score is 112. Let me know yours in the comments. Have fun! :)

Controls

Press SPACE to start
Press SPACE to jump
Press SPACE

Credits

The game code was made by me using Godot. The terrible art was also done by me using Aseprite

Extra

I haven't tested the MacOS or Linux versions of the game as I don't have access to any of these operating systems. If there are any problems with these versions feel free to leave a comment and let me know!
